mapper.select: SELECT INVOICE_STATEMENT_ID, FT_UNIT_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, PAYMENT_DEADLINE, BILLING_STATUS, BILLING_STATUS_UPDATE_DATE, PAYMENT_STATUS, PAYMENT_STATUS_UPDATE_DATE, PAYMENT_STATUS_REQUEST, PAYMENT_REQUEST_UPDATE_DATE FROM INVOICE_STATEMENTS_VIEW WHERE INVOICE_STATEMENT_ID = #{invoiceStatementId}

SELECT INVOICE_STATEMENT_ID, FT_UNIT_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, PAYMENT_DEADLINE, BILLING_STATUS, BILLING_STATUS_UPDATE_DATE, PAYMENT_STATUS, PAYMENT_STATUS_UPDATE_DATE, PAYMENT_STATUS_REQUEST, PAYMENT_REQUEST_UPDATE_DATE FROM INVOICE_STATEMENTS_VIEW WHERE FT_UNIT_ID = #{fundTransferUnitId}

SELECT INVOICE_STATEMENT_ID, FT_UNIT_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, PAYMENT_DEADLINE, BILLING_STATUS, BILLING_STATUS_UPDATE_DATE, PAYMENT_STATUS, PAYMENT_STATUS_UPDATE_DATE, PAYMENT_STATUS_REQUEST, PAYMENT_REQUEST_UPDATE_DATE FROM INVOICE_STATEMENTS_VIEW WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT FT_COMPANY_ID FROM CHARGE_ORDERS WHERE INVOICE_STATEMENTS_VIEW.INVOICE_STATEMENT_ID = CHARGE_ORDERS.INVOICE_STATEMENT_ID AND CHARGE_ORDERS.FT_COMPANY_ID = #{fundTransferCompanyId} )
